abstract: Cisco Systems, one of the tech industry’s most acquisitive firms since it struck its first deal in 1993, is ready to ramp up its deal-making pace again after a slowdown.
snippet: Cisco Systems, one of the tech industry’s most acquisitive firms since it struck its first deal in 1993, is ready to ramp up its deal-making pace again after a slowdown.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems, which has been one of the tech industry’s most acquisitive firms since it inked its first deal in 1993, is ready to ramp up its deal-making pace again after a slowdown since the start of the financial crisis, The Deal reports.
